pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena upāsakā bhikkhunisaṃghassa cīvaratthāya chandakaṃ saṅgharitvā aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:1.3: “amukassa, ayye, pāvārikassa ghare cīvaratthāya parikkhāro nikkhitto, tato cīvaraṃ āharāpetvā bhājethā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:1.4: Bhikkhuniyo tena ca parikkhārena sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:1.6: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:1.7: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:1.10: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:1.12: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:1.13: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:2.12: yaṃatthāya dinnaṃ taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:2.14: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:2.17: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṃghikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:2.21: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:2.22: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:2.23: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
